channel.title: Software Development on Robert Ferrante
channel.description: Recent content in Software Development on Robert Ferrante

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Robert Ferrante (rferrante). I am a software engineer. I think I’m of the old school; I consider it a profession, a craft, and a discipline. I am currently learning Go, and I’m sharing some software on Github. I started out working in C, moving into Objective-C, VB, Java, then C# for a while, followed by Python. There is something to be said for them all, but Go feels like home now.
